wikipedia_page.main: James George Beale (born 7 February 1881, date of death unknown) was a British track and field athlete who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics and the 1912 Summer Olympics in the Men's Marathon. He finished 17th in 1908 and did not finish in 1912.

response: *Africanus Horton (1835–1883), also known as James Beale, writer and folklorist from Sierra Leone
